location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter No. 40: William Digges Latouche, Resident at Bussora [Basra], to John Beaumont, Resident at Bushire

mods.abstract: In this letter, received 14 July 1780, via the Eagle,William Digges Latouche, Resident at Bussora [Basra], informs John Beaumont, Resident at Bushire, of George Abraham's death and also of the death of Captain Shirress. Beaumont is also informed that a Turkish officer from the Port is to be accommodated with a passage to Muscat on the Eagle.
